data.englishTranslation: Praise is to Allah Who has given me this food and sustained me with it though I was unable to do it and powerless.
data.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'at'amanee haathaa, wa razaqaneehi, min ghayri hawlin minnee wa laa quwwatin.
data.arabicVerse: الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا، وَرَزَقَنِيهِ، مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ

data.englishTranslation: All praise is to Allah, praise in abundance, good and blessed. It cannot (be compensated for, nor can it) be left, nor can it be done without, our Lord.
data.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahi hamdan katheeran tayyiban mubaarakan feehi, ghayra makfiyyin wa laa muwadda'in, wa laa mustaghnan 'anhu Rabbanaa.
data.arabicVerse: الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ حَمْداً كَثِيراً طَيِّباً مُبارَكاً فِيهِ، غَيْرَ مَكْفِيٍّ وَلِا مُوَدَّعٍ، وَلَا مُسْتَغْنىً عَنْهُ رَبَّنَا
